name: CAMARA NACIONAL DE LAS INDUSTRIAS AZUCARERA Y ALCOHOLERA (CNIAA)
description: Trade association for Mexican-based sugar companies.
sampleDescriptions: Administrative and legislative monitoring and outreach related to sugar quota related issues. Administrative and legislative monitoring and outreach concerning U.S. & Mexican trade issues.
